content.rendered: The Suntory Platinum Collection features three of the very best whiskies from the hugely successful drinks giant. If you want to try the best of the best Japanese whiskies, this is a great place to start. You’ll get a flavour of Yamazaki, Hakushu and Hibiki and you certainly won’t be disappointed.

excerpt.rendered:
This set includes:
Yamazaki 18 Year Old
Hakushu 18 Year Old
Hibiki 17 Year Old
Weight: 6 Kg
Size: 700ml
